word: A. G. DANIELLS: I KNOW THEY WANT TO FOSTER THE WORK THAT EDSON BEGAN AMONG THE COLORED PEOPLE; BUT THEY DO NOT CARE TO HAVE HIM CONTRACT DEBTS FOR THIS WORK AND THEN SEND IN THE BILLS FOR THEM TO SETTLE, IN SOME WAY, FROM THEIR TREASURY. THEY FEEL THAT THEY HAVE A RIGHT TO SAY SOMETHING ABOUT THE DEBTS THAT ARE CONTRACTED IF THEY HAVE TO PAY THEM; AND IF THEY KNOW THAT THIS IS YOUR POSITION TOO, IT WILL DO THEM A WORLD OF GOOD.
